projects.Title: Task Manager
projects.description: Simplify task management with this web application. Developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap for a clean interface. Users can add, edit, and delete tasks for efficient organization.

projects.Title: Hotel Booking Application
projects.description: Easily book hotel rooms using this web application. Utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it provides a straightforward booking experience with a user-friendly interface.

projects.Title: Taxi System App
projects.description: Experience convenient transportation with this web application. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it mimics a taxi system. Users can request rides in a visually appealing interface.

projects.Title: Password Generator Web App
projects.description: Enhance online Password Generator web app. Developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it creates strong passwords for users. The user-interface ensures a secure password creation process.
